name: Monster Mover
description:
Use WAD to move, and S to slow down time for one of your ships.

Both ships have the same controls. 

Try to get the monsters to shoot the rope connecting your ships to win!

Orange arrows can only hurt the orange ship, and blue arrows can only hurt the blue ship.

P to pause

Minor Update:

Zoomed camera out, made the rope longer, and made the ships faster.

Minor Update 2:

Several bug fixes, added pause screen
